description.value: Diese Conceptmap verknüpft die Codes für KBV_CM_MIO_ULB_Overview mit deutschen Bezeichnungen.

copyright.value: Im folgenden Profil können Codes aus den Codesystemen Snomed, Loinc oder Ucum enthalten sein, die dem folgenden Urheberrecht unterliegen: This material includes SNOMED Clinical Terms® (SNOMED CT®) which is used by permission of SNOMED International. All rights reserved. SNOMED CT®, was originally created by The College of American Pathologists. SNOMED and SNOMED CT are registered trademarks of SNOMED International. Implementers of these artefacts must have the appropriate SNOMED CT Affiliate license. This material contains content from LOINC (http://loinc.org). LOINC is copyright © 1995-2020, Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes (LOINC) Committee and is available at no cost under the license at http://loinc.org/license. LOINC® is a registered United States trademark of Regenstrief Institute, Inc. This product includes all or a portion of the UCUM table, UCUM codes, and UCUM definitions or is derived from it, subject to a license from Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and The UCUM Organization. Your use of the UCUM table, UCUM codes, UCUM definitions also is subject to this license, a copy of which is available at ​http://unitsofmeasure.org. The current complete UCUM table, UCUM Specification are available for download at http://unitsofmeasure.org. The UCUM table and UCUM codes are copyright © 1995-2009, Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Unified Codes for Units of Measures (UCUM) Organization. All rights reserved. THE UCUM TABLE (IN ALL FORMATS), UCUM DEFINITIONS, AND SPECIFICATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS." ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES ARE DISCLAIMED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

display.value: Advance healthcare directive status (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Absent (qualifier value)
Advance healthcare directive status (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Undetermined (qualifier value)
Advance healthcare directive status (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Present (qualifier value)
Propensity to adverse reaction (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Absent (qualifier value)
Allergien oder Unverträglichkeiten liegen nicht vor
Propensity to adverse reaction (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Undetermined (qualifier value)
Vorliegen von Allergien oder Unverträglichkeiten unbekannt
Propensity to adverse reaction (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Present (qualifier value)

Procedure with explicit context (situation) : Associated procedure (attribute) = Procedures relating to control, restraint, seclusion and segregation (procedure) , Procedure context (attribute) = Contraindicated (qualifier value)

Procedure with explicit context (situation) : Associated procedure (attribute) = Procedures relating to control, restraint, seclusion and segregation (procedure) , Procedure context (attribute) = Action status unknown (qualifier value)
Es ist unbekannt, ob freiheitsentziehende Maßnahmen notwendig sind.

Procedure with explicit context (situation) : Associated procedure (attribute) = Procedures relating to control, restraint, seclusion and segregation (procedure) , Procedure context (attribute) = Recommended (qualifier value)

Clinical finding (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Absent (qualifier value) , Associated with (attribute) = ( Disability (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Degree findings (qualifier value) )

Clinical finding (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Undetermined (qualifier value) , Associated with (attribute) = ( Disability (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Degree findings (qualifier value) )
Es ist unbekannt, ob ein Behinderungsgrad vorhanden ist.

Clinical finding (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Present (qualifier value) , Associated with (attribute) = ( Disability (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Degree findings (qualifier value) )
Clinical finding absent (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Body disability AND/OR failure state (finding)
Clinical finding present (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Body disability AND/OR failure state (finding)

Finding with explicit context (situation) : { Associated finding (attribute) = Body disability AND/OR failure state (finding) , Finding context (attribute) = Unknown (qualifier value) , Subject relationship context (attribute) = Subject of record (person) , Temporal context (attribute) = Current or specified time (qualifier value) }
Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Urethral catheter, device (physical object) , Has interpretation (attribute) = Present (qualifier value)
Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Nephrostomy system (physical object) , Has interpretation (attribute) = Present (qualifier value)
Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Evacuation of gastrointestinal tract contents (procedure)
Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Insertion of flatus tube into rectum (procedure)
Feeding finding (finding) : Interprets (attribute) = Oral intake (observable entity)
Power of attorney medical report (record artifact)

Situation with explicit context (situation) : { Subject relationship context (attribute) = Legal guardian (person) } { Associated finding (attribute) = ( Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Record artifact (record artifact) ) } { Associated finding (attribute) = ( Information status (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Absent (qualifier value) ) }

Situation with explicit context (situation) : { Subject relationship context (attribute) = Legal guardian (person) } { Associated finding (attribute) = ( Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Record artifact (record artifact) ) } { Associated finding (attribute) = ( Information status (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Undetermined (qualifier value) ) }

Situation with explicit context (situation) : { Subject relationship context (attribute) = Legal guardian (person) } { Associated finding (attribute) = ( Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Record artifact (record artifact) ) } { Associated finding (attribute) = ( Information status (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Present (qualifier value) ) }
Drug therapy finding (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Undetermined (qualifier value)
Drug therapy finding (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Present (qualifier value)
Procedure with explicit context (situation) : Associated procedure (attribute) = Isolation procedure (procedure) , Procedure context (attribute) = Action status unknown (qualifier value)
Procedure with explicit context (situation) : Associated procedure (attribute) = Isolation procedure (procedure) , Procedure context (attribute) = Recommended (qualifier value)
Procedure with explicit context (situation) : Associated procedure (attribute) = Isolation procedure (procedure) , Procedure context (attribute) = Not recommended (qualifier value)

Finding of residence and accommodation circumstances (finding) : { Interprets (attribute) = Residence and accommodation circumstances (observable entity) , Has interpretation (attribute) = Undetermined (qualifier value) } { Finding method (attribute) = History taking (procedure) }

Finding of residence and accommodation circumstances (finding) : { Interprets (attribute) = Residence and accommodation circumstances (observable entity) , Has interpretation (attribute) = Adult day care center (environment) } { Finding method (attribute) = History taking (procedure) }

Finding of residence and accommodation circumstances (finding) : { Interprets (attribute) = Residence and accommodation circumstances (observable entity) , Has interpretation (attribute) = Inpatient environment (environment) } { Finding method (attribute) = History taking (procedure) }
Percutaneous transluminal angioplasty balloon, device (physical object)
Artificial cardiac valve prosthesis, device (physical object)
Orthopedic internal fixation system, device (physical object)
Clinical finding absent (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Biomedical device (physical object)
Clinical finding present (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Biomedical device (physical object)

Finding with explicit context (situation) : { Associated finding (attribute) = ( Clinical finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Biomedical device (physical object) ) , Finding context (attribute) = Unknown (qualifier value) , Subject relationship context (attribute) = Subject of record (person) , Temporal context (attribute) = Current or specified time (qualifier value) }
Vorliegen von Informationen zu Medizinprodukten unbekannt
Clinical finding absent (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Nutritional finding (finding)
Informationen zur Ernährung liegen nicht vor
Clinical finding present (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Nutritional finding (finding)

Finding with explicit context (situation) : { Associated finding (attribute) = Nutritional finding (finding) , Finding context (attribute) = Unknown (qualifier value) , Subject relationship context (attribute) = Subject of record (person) , Temporal context (attribute) = Current or specified time (qualifier value) }
Vorliegen von Informationen zur Ernährung unbekannt
Oriented to person (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Reduced (qualifier value)
Oriented to place (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Reduced (qualifier value)
Disorientated (finding) + Finding related to ability to comprehend (finding)
Oriented to time (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Reduced (qualifier value)

Finding with explicit context (situation) : { Associated finding (attribute) = Pain (finding) , Finding context (attribute) = Unknown (qualifier value) , Subject relationship context (attribute) = Subject of record (person) , Temporal context (attribute) = Current or specified time (qualifier value) }
Prescription payment exemption status (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Absent (qualifier value)
Prescription payment exemption status (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Undetermined (qualifier value)
Respiratory finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Artificial respiration (procedure) , Has interpretation (attribute) = Absent (qualifier value)
Respiratory finding (finding) : Associated with (attribute) = Artificial respiration (procedure) , Has interpretation (attribute) = Present (qualifier value)
Clinical finding absent (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Problem (finding)
Clinical finding present (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Problem (finding)

Finding with explicit context (situation) : { Associated finding (attribute) = Problem (finding) , Finding context (attribute) = Unknown (qualifier value) , Subject relationship context (attribute) = Subject of record (person) , Temporal context (attribute) = Current or specified time (qualifier value) }
Relatives unable to care for patient (finding)
Relatives involved with care (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Able (qualifier value)
Relatives involved with care (finding) : Has interpretation (attribute) = Undetermined (qualifier value)

Procedure with explicit context (situation) : { Temporal context (attribute) = Current or specified time (qualifier value) , Procedure context (attribute) = Not done (qualifier value) , Associated procedure (attribute) = Notifications (procedure) , Subject relationship context (attribute) = Person in family of subject (person) }

Procedure with explicit context (situation) : { Temporal context (attribute) = Current or specified time (qualifier value) , Procedure context (attribute) = Action status unknown (qualifier value) , Associated procedure (attribute) = Notifications (procedure) , Subject relationship context (attribute) = Person in family of subject (person) }
At risk for imbalanced nutrition, less than body requirements (finding)
Clinical finding absent (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Finding of at risk (finding)
Clinical finding present (situation) : Associated finding (attribute) = Finding of at risk (finding)

Finding with explicit context (situation) : { Associated finding (attribute) = Finding of at risk (finding) , Finding context (attribute) = Unknown (qualifier value) , Subject relationship context (attribute) = Subject of record (person) , Temporal context (attribute) = Current or specified time (qualifier value) }
